{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CyberTAN |model=WGV614 |revision=-A3 |asin= |fcc_date=05/11/2006 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=N89-WM610P |pcb_id=3762-16141005 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425;FWIXP425BC, L4460166, INTEL(M)(C)2002, Z446T065B, 446 KOREA; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16800-7T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=CyberTAN WM610-P |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Inprocomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPN2220;IPN2220, QA3253.1, A044307; |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model=RF2959 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-TNC |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L;AC101LKQT, TD0446 P11, 732860A; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996L;ADM6996L, AA0451, HS430007.4SL; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=VxWorks;5.5.1; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=WGV614A3 |default_ssid_regex=^WGV614A3$ |default_ip=192.168.15.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:01:36 |oui_eth=00:01:36 }} {{TagLine|802.11b/g Security Gateway}} *"3762-16141005" is silkscreened on the main board. *"3761-36100202" is silkscreened on the wireless module board. ===Models=== *[[Linksys WRT54GP2A-AT]] (w/ VoIP capability) *[[Linksys RT41P2-AT]] (w/ omitted miniPCI slot + Wi-Fi, :has VoIP capability) appear to share the same board. ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=19502 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] (w/ boot log) ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|boot log â€¢ >> |
